import React from "react"; const style = { color: "black", fontFamily: "Trattatello", display: "inline", }; const tableStyle = { color: "black", border: "1px solid black", padding: "1px", fontFamily: "Trattatello" }; const imgClass = { width: "50px", height: "auto" }; export const Forecast = ({forecast}) => { let arr = forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].hour arr = [arr[0], arr[3], arr[6], arr[9], arr[12], arr[15], arr[18], arr[21]] return (

Today's weather in {forecast.location.name}, {forecast.location.region}

{forecast.current.condition.text}
{arr.map(hour => ( ))}
Time Weather Temperature(Feels Like) Humidity Wind Speed (MPH)
{hour.time} {hour.temp_f}({hour.feelslike_f}) F {hour.humidity}% {hour.wind_mph}
Sunrise: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.sunrise}Sunset: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.sunset}Moonrise: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.moonrise}Moonset: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.moonset}
) };
